pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Import packages from the root of a monorepoInstructions:1. First create a file named `.monorepo_root` at the root of your monorepo.2. Use `monorepo.load_package` to load packages from anywhere in your monorepo.Example usage:```pythonimport monorepo# The `load_package` function will search up from the current directory for a# file named `.monorepo_root`, which is used to determine the root directory# from which to load `example.package.foo`:foo = monorepo.load_package("example.package.foo")# The foo package can be used directly:foo.bar_function()# We can also import other subpackages:from foo.bar import baz```
